from manim import *

class CircleToSquare(Scene):
    def construct(self):
        # Create a circle
        circle = Circle(color=BLUE)
        circle.set_fill(BLUE, opacity=0.5)
        
        # Create a square
        square = Square(color=GREEN)
        square.set_fill(GREEN, opacity=0.5)
        
        # Position the square at the same location as the circle
        square.move_to(circle.get_center())
        
        # Animate the transition from circle to square
        self.play(Create(circle))  # Draw the circle
        self.wait(1)  # Pause for clarity
        self.play(Transform(circle, square), run_time=3)  # Morph circle into square
        self.wait(1)  # Pause to end scene cleanly
